titles.title: Martin Luther King, Jr., Memorial Reauthorization Act
A bill to reauthorize the memorial to Martin Luther King, Jr.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 9/26/2008--Introduced. Martin Luther King, Jr., Memorial Reauthorization Act - Amends the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 to extend until November 12, 2009, the authority to permit the establishment of a memorial in the District of Columbia to honor Martin Luther King, Jr.
